name: Klar
description: A static and minimalistic HTML and Bootstrap 5 template

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run clean-prod && npx eleventy && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs sass && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs minify-css && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs dist-assets && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs prod-copy && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs inject-min-css && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs purgecss && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs minify-html && node webp.mjs
scripts.build-dev: eleventy && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs dist-assets && gulp --gulpfile gulpfile.cjs sass
scripts.watch-dev: npm run build-dev && npm run sync
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run build-dev && run-p sync watch:all

author: Holger Koenemann
